001package gust.backend;
002
003import io.micronaut.views.soy.SoyContextMediator;
004import tools.elide.page.Context;
005
006import javax.annotation.Nonnull;
007
008
009/**
010 * Interface by which protobuf-driven Soy render context can be managed and orchestrated by a custom {@link PageContext}
011 * object. Provides the ability to specify variables for <pre>@param</pre> and <pre>@inject</pre> Soy declarations, and
012 * the ability to override objects like the {@link io.micronaut.views.soy.SoyNamingMapProvider}.
013 *
014 * @author Sam Gammon (sam@momentum.io)
015 * @see PageContext Default implementation of this interface
016 */
017public interface PageRender extends SoyContextMediator {
018  /** Name at which proto-context is injected. */
019  String PAGE_CONTEXT_IJ_NAME = "page";
020
021  /**
022   * Retrieve serializable server-side-rendered page context, which should be assigned to the render flow bound to this
023   * context mediator.
024   *
025   * @return Server-side rendered page context.
026   */
027  @Nonnull Context getPageContext();
028}
